title: Not getting worlds missions after i bought the token thing for more?
body: So i've been doing the missions, finished them all yesterday now i have now when they said they would all end at 6am today i was assuming i would get more???

replies.body: The Worlds missions were only designed to be around while Worlds was taking place. Now that the Finals have ended and this year's champs have been crowned, there won't be any more Worlds styled missions this year.
